about_the_game:
The zombie carrot situation has gotten out of control! Team up with friends and NPCs to fight with you in this new survivors-like: Grow your arsenal before the horde crushes you, unlock characters with unique weapons and explore a factory full of machines to harness the power of Progress!



Fight your way through massive hordes of enemies using an arsenal of unique weapons, anything goes! A fire extinguisher, a heavy duty stapler, a combat drone, or a lightning rod! A big cast of varied characters each bringing in their own uniquely flavored weapon.

Level up and grow your weapons to face the ever-increasing horde, featuring all sorts of enemies: From vegetable zombies to corporate security!



Team up with your friends, or together with NPCs, in this team-first experience. Carrot Survivors is the perfect survivors-like for some Saturday afternoon couch fun with friends!

Keyboard and multiple controllers supported: Not enough controllers? No problem! Plug more keyboards!
One-handed play mode: Dual wield your controllers for maximum efficiency!



No more boring grass fields! In Carrot Survivors you'll explore the remains of the Carrot Corp facility, now destroyed after this carrot zombie apocalypse. Out there, you'll find useful machines that will help you get an edge over your foes: Grab a snack at the vending machine, or fire up that industrial vacuum cleaner to bring in those hard-to-collect pickups.



Featuring a big character roster, you'll be unlocking new content on every run! Find your allies scattered across the map, recruit them as hirelings and keep them around for long enough to permanently recruit them. Each new recruit brings in a new unique weapon that will appear in future runs!

Don't forget to try our free demo and wishlist the game to receive our updates!

Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL
